item.description:
Amigos Merrimack
75 Daniel Webster Hwy
Merrimack, NH
(603) 578-9950

Amigos Mexican Cantina is "Not Your Typical Mexican Restaurant". We serve your all favorite dishes from Tacos, Burritos, and Chimis as well as Tamales and Chili Rellenos . In addition we put a spin on just about everything. Where else can you enjoy "Mexican Mac 'N Cheese" or a "Death Valley Burrito" made with our own hand made and breaded chicken tenders tossed in our Death Valley Sauce and stuffed in a burrito?

We use only the freshest ingredients prepared daily and each meal is cooked to order. In addition to our regular menu Amigos also has an extensive "Gluten Free Menu" and a great kids menu.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Midweek Mexican
